templates: can i pay using credit card?
what payment options do you have?
can i pay with debit card?

templates: do i need to pay custom duty?
answer: No, you don't need to pay any custom duty! We handle all customs clearance and there are no additional charges on any product or order.

templates: what if i receive a defective product?
answer: We apologize for any defective products! Please email us photos within 48 hours at support@desifood.com. We'll send a replacement immediately or issue a full refund.

templates: which brand is good for ghee?
answer: Top ghee brands: Amul (most popular), Nandini, Mother Dairy, Patanjali, Gowardhan, and Vedaka. For organic options, try Organic India or Vedaka.

templates: which brand is bad for ghee?
answer: Avoid brands with unclear ingredient lists, artificial colors, or preservatives. Stay away from brands that mix vegetable oils with ghee. Always check for 100% pure ghee certification. Stick with trusted brands like Amul, Nandini, or Mother Dairy for quality assurance.

templates: which brand is good for rice?
answer: Top rice brands: India Gate (Classic & Dubar), Daawat, Kohinoor, Fortune, and Lal Qilla. For premium basmati, choose India Gate Dubar or Daawat Rozana.

templates: which brand is bad for rice?
answer: Avoid unbranded or loose rice with unclear origin. Stay away from brands with broken grains, stones, or impurities. Always buy from trusted brands like India Gate, Daawat, or Kohinoor for quality and cleanliness.

templates: which brand is good for atta?
answer: Top atta brands: Aashirvaad (most popular), Pillsbury, Annapurna, Nature Fresh, and Shakti Bhog. For whole wheat, Aashirvaad Select is excellent.

templates: which brand is bad for atta?
answer: Avoid atta with added maida (refined flour), bleaching agents, or preservatives. Stay away from brands with unclear milling dates or storage conditions. Stick with trusted brands like Aashirvaad or Pillsbury for pure whole wheat.

templates: which brand is good for dal?
answer: Top dal/pulses brands: Tata Sampann, Aashirvaad, Fortune, Organic India, and Vedaka. Tata Sampann offers excellent quality and variety.

templates: which brand is good for oil?
answer: Top cooking oil brands: Fortune, Sundrop, Saffola (heart-healthy), Dhara, and Gemini. For mustard oil: KS Oils or Patanjali.

templates: which brand is good for spices?
answer: Top spice brands: MDH, Everest, Catch, Tata Sampann, and Patanjali. For authentic taste, MDH and Everest are most trusted.

templates: which brand is good for tea?
answer: Top tea brands: Tata Tea (Gold & Premium), Taj Mahal, Red Label, Society Tea, and Wagh Bakri. For premium: Tata Tea Gold or Taj Mahal.

templates: which brand is good for snacks?
answer: Top snack brands: Haldiram's (most popular), Bikaji, Balaji, Kurkure, and Bingo. For traditional namkeen, Haldiram's is the best choice.

templates: which brand is good for pickle?
answer: Top pickle brands: Priya, Mother's Recipe, Nilon's, Patanjali, and Ashoka. For authentic South Indian pickles, Priya is excellent.
Prices vary by brand and quantity. Please visit our website or app to see current prices. We offer competitive pricing and regular discounts!

templates: how many kg can i buy?
answer: You can order any quantity from 100g to 50kg per item. For bulk orders above 50kg, contact wholesale@desifood.com for special pricing.

templates: when will i receive my order?

templates: which is better amul or nandini?
answer: Both brands are excellent! The choice depends on your preference. Most popular brands like Amul, India Gate, and Aashirvaad offer consistent quality. Try both and see which you prefer!

templates: which countries do you ship to?
answer: We ship to USA, Canada, UK, Australia, UAE, Singapore, Germany, and 50+ other countries. Check availability at checkout by entering your postal code.

templates: do you have gluten free products?
answer: Yes! We have gluten-free rice, millets, gluten-free atta, and snacks. Filter by 'Gluten-Free' or check product labels for certification.
